00023 #define MPC_FIXED_POINT_SCALE_SHIFT (MPC_FIXED_POINT_SHIFT + MPC_FIXED_POINT_FRACTPART)
00024 #define MPC_FIXED_POINT_SCALE (1 << (MPC_FIXED_POINT_SCALE_SHIFT - 1))

00027 //in fixedpoint mode, results in decode output buffer are in -MPC_FIXED_POINT_SCALE ... MPC_FIXED_POINT_SCALE range
00028 
00029 #define MPC_FIXED_POINT_FRACTPART 14
00030 typedef mpc_int32_t MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT;
00031 
00032 typedef mpc_int64_t MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY;
00033 
00034 #define MAKE_MPC_SAMPLE(X) (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)((double)(X) * (double)(((mpc_int64_t)1)<<MPC_FIXED_POINT_FRACTPART))
00035 #define MAKE_MPC_SAMPLE_EX(X,Y) (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)((double)(X) * (double)(((mpc_int64_t)1)<<(Y)))
00036 
00037 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_NOTRUNCATE(X,Y) \
00038         (((MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(X) * (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(Y)) >> MPC_FIXED_POINT_FRACTPART)
00039 
00040 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_EX_NOTRUNCATE(X,Y,Z) \
00041         (((MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(X) * (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(Y)) >> (Z))
00042 
00043 #ifdef _DEBUG
00044 static inline MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT MPC_MULTIPLY(MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT item1,MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT item2)
00045 {
00046         MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY temp = MPC_MULTIPLY_NOTRUNCATE(item1,item2);
00047         assert(temp == (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)temp);
00048         return (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)temp;
00049 }
00050 
00051 static inline MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT item1,MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT item2,unsigned shift)
00052 {
00053         MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY temp = MPC_MULTIPLY_EX_NOTRUNCATE(item1,item2,shift);
00054         assert(temp == (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT_MULTIPLY)(MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)temp);
00055         return (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)temp;
00056 }
00057 
00058 #else
00059 
00060 #define MPC_MULTIPLY(X,Y) ((MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)MPC_MULTIPLY_NOTRUNCATE(X,Y))
00061 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(X,Y,Z) ((MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)MPC_MULTIPLY_EX_NOTRUNCATE(X,Y,Z))
00062 
00063 #endif

00065 #ifdef MPC_HAVE_MULHIGH
00066 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT(X,Y) _MulHigh(X,Y)
00067 #else
00068 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT(X,Y) MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(X,Y,32)
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #define MPC_MAKE_FRACT_CONST(X) (MPC_SAMPLE_FORMAT)((X) * (double)(((mpc_int64_t)1)<<32) )
00072 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT_CONST(X,Y) MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT(X,MPC_MAKE_FRACT_CONST(Y))
00073 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT_CONST_FIX(X,Y,Z) ( MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT(X,MPC_MAKE_FRACT_CONST( Y / (1<<(Z)) )) << (Z) )
00074 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT_CONST_SHR(X,Y,Z) MPC_MULTIPLY_FRACT(X,MPC_MAKE_FRACT_CONST( Y / (1<<(Z)) ))
00075 
00076 #define MPC_MULTIPLY_FLOAT_INT(X,Y) ((X)*(Y))
00077 #define MPC_SCALE_CONST(X,Y,Z) MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(X,MAKE_MPC_SAMPLE_EX(Y,Z),(Z))
00078 #define MPC_SCALE_CONST_SHL(X,Y,Z,S) MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(X,MAKE_MPC_SAMPLE_EX(Y,Z),(Z)-(S))
00079 #define MPC_SCALE_CONST_SHR(X,Y,Z,S) MPC_MULTIPLY_EX(X,MAKE_MPC_SAMPLE_EX(Y,Z),(Z)+(S))
00080 #define MPC_SHR(X,Y) ((X)>>(Y))
00081 #define MPC_SHL(X,Y) ((X)<<(Y))
